Posts.Content: Apr 2, 2018 07:14AM NWisbest wrote: I had SGAP in NOLA beginning of March. I’m on day 22 of misery with one drain remaining. Any tips to decrease my body producing fluids? I am already back to work and found just laying around helps a bit but I’m also growing nervous for being on antibiotics this long and still having my cc’s so high in output from this drain. I welcome any Tips.
Posts.Title: March 2018 Surgery Group mkn86 Kaykat
